Count DNase-seq or ATAC-seq cleavage for a given genome.

Source: R/dnase_utils.R
count_dnase_genome_cuts.Rd

Count DNase-seq or ATAC-seq cleavage for a given genome.

count_dnase_genome_cuts(
  bam_file,
  chrom_size_file,
  outdir,
  outname,
  bedtools_path = "bedtools",
  bedGraphToBigWig_path = "bedGraphToBigWig",
  bedSort_path = "bedSort"
)

Arguments

bam_file

Sorted BAM file.

chrom_size_file

File name of genome sizes by chromosomes.

outdir

Output directory.

outname

Output prefix.

bedtools_path

Path to bedtools executable.

bedGraphToBigWig_path

Path to UCSC bedGraphToBigWig executable.

bedSort_path

Path to UCSC bedSort executable.

Contents
